The discovery of Joyce Carol Vincent: s remains in her apartment in Wood Green, north-east London in January 2006.
The badly decomposed state of Vincent: s remains, described as largely skeletal by pathologist Dr. Simon Poole, supporting the claim made in the "Weird Facts" meme.
The presence of Vincent: s television still switched on when she was found.
The estimation of Vincent: s time of death around December 2003, based on the expiration dates of food and medication found in her apartment.
